meta.title: COVID-19 - Moscow Chamber of Commerce, ID

div.p: We care about you, our clients, customers and the community in which we are proud to serve, and we take your health and safety seriously. We are closely monitoring and following the guidance of the CDC and our local agencies. We have made the decision to postpone events temporarily from Monday March 16th until Friday May 15th. We will share additional information and rescheduled dates as soon as possible. Based on cautionary efforts to protect our employees and customers, the Moscow Chamber of Commerce business office will be closed starting Wednesday, March 18th.

The Chamber staff is committed to supporting you and will remain connected remotely while the physical office location is closed (411 S Main Street). Our goal for the community is to continue to support local in ways that are safe and appropriate for them.
We welcome our clients and members to visit our website and official social media accounts for any news and updates regarding our services and operations.

This entire situation is very new and challenging for everyone. With kindness, understanding and patience we will all make it through this together.If there are any questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to us so that we can further assist.
Thank you for your continued support.
Please see our resources below for updates in our community and links to websites that provide information for small businesses.
For additional resources please click on any of the following links below:
